text: The Bowls England National Championships (Women's Top Club) is one of the events at the annual Bowls England National Championships. ==Past Winners== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- !width="50"|Year !width="250"|Champion !width="150"|County !width="250"|Runner-up !width="150"|County |- | align=center|2008|| Oxford City & County|| Oxfordshire ||Sutton|| Surrey |- | align=center|2009||Kings || Devon ||Wellingborough|| Northamptonshire |- | align=center|2010||Portishead RBL|| Somerset ||Oxford City & County|| Oxfordshire |- | align=center|2011||Saffron Ladies|| Sussex ||Forest Oaks|| Nottinghamshire |- | align=center|2012||Wigton||Cumbria ||Croydon|| Surrey |- | align=center|2013||Oxford City & County|| Oxfordshire ||Egham|| Surrey |- | align=center|2014||Egham|| Surrey ||Saffron Ladies|| Suffolk |- | align=center|2015||Egham|| Surrey ||Banbury Central|| Oxfordshire |- | align=center|2016||Wigton|| Cumbria||Kings|| Devon |- | align=center|2017||Wigton|| Cumbria||Parkway|| Huntingdonshire |- | align=center|2018||Kings||Devon || Sutton|| Surrey |- | align=center|2019|| Kings ||Devon || Baldock ||Hertfordshire |- |align=center|2020|| cancelled || ||due to the COVID-19 pandemic. || |} ==References== Category:Bowls in England
